 >     Posted by: "eisuke_2001" eisuke_2001@...   eisuke_2001

 >     Hi... I was wondering if anyone here's watching the weekly Historical
 >     dramas of NHK. I've been watching them since my college days starting
 >     with th "Aoi" series. Just a question, how accurate are they?

There usually pretty good but in the case of many of the characters they 
have to invent many details. Sometimes they alter history to make a 
better story like when Hideyoshi watches Goemen boil, it never happened 
but they were plot friends. Yoshitsune and Musashi had a fair amount of 
this as well, still they were great! Much better than Shinsengumi. The 
current one is OK but not a knockout. Next best thing to chanbara....

Jim Eckman
